docs.snippet: A local school board in upstate New York has voted to hire a law firm in the board's efforts to remove a Donald Trump supporter over his insulting comments about President Barack Obama and his wife....
docs.lead_paragraph: A local school board in upstate New York has voted to hire a law firm in the board's efforts to remove a Donald Trump supporter over his insulting comments about President Barack Obama and his wife.

headline.main: School Board Votes to Hire Lawyer to Remove Trump Supporter
headline.print_headline: School Board Votes to Hire Lawyer to Remove Trump Supporter

docs.snippet: Tunisia coach Henryk Kasperczak has chosen a 23-man squad for the African Nations Cup finals in Gabon that features mostly home-based players - a rarity for the tournament....

headline.main: Tunisia Place Faith in Home-Based Players

docs.snippet: An inmate suing prison medical staff for forcibly medicating him with psychotropic drugs refused to enter a courtroom on the first day of trial Thursday, prompting a judge to dismiss the case....
docs.lead_paragraph: An inmate suing prison medical staff for forcibly medicating him with psychotropic drugs refused to enter a courtroom on the first day of trial Thursday, prompting a judge to dismiss the case.

headline.main: Inmate Suing Over Forced Meds Won't Enter Court; Case Tossed
headline.print_headline: Inmate Suing Over Forced Meds Won't Enter Court; Case Tossed

docs.snippet: France paid tribute on Thursday to the journalists, police officers and shoppers at a kosher store killed two years ago by Islamist gunmen, the first of a wave of militant attacks that has left more than 230 dead and triggered a state of emergency...
docs.lead_paragraph: France paid tribute on Thursday to the journalists, police officers and shoppers at a kosher store killed two years ago by Islamist gunmen, the first of a wave of militant attacks that has left more than 230 dead and triggered a state of emergency.

headline.main: Charlie Hebdo Tribute Marks Two Years of Islamist Attacks on France
headline.print_headline: Charlie Hebdo Tribute Marks Two Years of Islamist Attacks on France

docs.snippet: An attorney for Park Geun-hye compared her trial with those of Christ and Socrates, warning against “so-called majority opinion instigated through demagogy.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: An attorney for Park Geun-hye compared her trial with those of Christ and Socrates, warning against “so-called majority opinion instigated through demagogy.”

headline.main: Impeachment Trial of South Korea President Called Mob Justice

docs.snippet: Just as some American men have embraced makeup, young Japanese men are bending gender norms, a big step in a culture where genders hew strictly to convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Just as some American men have embraced makeup, young Japanese men are bending gender norms, a big step in a culture where genders hew strictly to convention.

headline.main: With Manicures and Makeup, Japan’s ‘Genderless’ Blur Line Between Pink and Blue

docs.snippet: Toman Sasaki is among a new wave of young Japanese men bending gender norms. He wears nail polish and makeup, but does not regard his look as feminine. “Regardless of sex, we believe we can live however we like,” he said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toman Sasaki is among a new wave of young Japanese men bending gender norms. He wears nail polish and makeup, but does not regard his look as feminine. “Regardless of sex, we believe we can live however we like,” he said.

docs.snippet: Whenever potential buyers have approached Tel Aviv-based Fiverr, the technology firm has said no; like a growing number of Israeli start-ups, it has enough backing from private investors to stay independent for longer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Whenever potential buyers have approached Tel Aviv-based Fiverr, the technology firm has said no; like a growing number of Israeli start-ups, it has enough backing from private investors to stay independent for longer.

headline.main: Flush With Funds, Israeli Tech Firms Delay Exits
headline.print_headline: Flush With Funds, Israeli Tech Firms Delay Exits
